text.autoconfig.olifantenpad.title: Olifantenpad Settings
text.autoconfig.olifantenpad.option.path: Determines how quickly a path is carved
text.autoconfig.olifantenpad.option.chan: The chance a block is changed at the required depth
text.autoconfig.olifantenpad.option.snea: Paths won't be carved when the player is sneaking
